Author: Cryptofist#7504
Content: @Crabby Paddy  Get virtual box, install ubuntu, update it, install komodo (this takes the longest) then use the getting started with rogue doc to install rogue, then you can play.

Author: Cryptofist#7504
Content: Start with the updated version of ubuntu, when you make your virtual box machine, use 4 gigs of ram and a 20 gig HD to avoid any obnoxious install problems as a  linux noob. I just did all of this and didnt know how to do any of it 4 days ago.

Name: fred
